cb: node /path/to/cli.mjs create <name> --ecosystem typescript --frontend <f> --backend <b> --runtime <r> --database <db> --orm <orm> --auth <auth> --api <api> --db-setup none --package-manager bun --no-install --no-git --disable-analytics --web-deploy none --server-deploy none --ai-docs claude-md ...

notes: Batch 4: 10 combos verified with bun install + bun run check-types (TS) / cargo check (Rust) / go build (Go) / python3 -m compileall (Python)
Worktree was on v1.3.15 branch; batch-3 fixes cherry-picked from main (32354bb7) into worktree templates
CLI v1.3.15 has new required flags vs v1.3.14: --payments none --email none --file-upload none --web-deploy none --server-deploy none --package-manager bun --no-git
Also: --ai none --realtime none --job-queue none --animation none --forms none (all require explicit none)
--ai-docs claude-md (not --ai-docs none which hangs), --db-setup none (not --manual-db which prompts)
2 new bugs found and fixed in repo:
BugI: db/drizzle/mysql/src/index.ts.hbs used connection:{ uri: env.DATABASE_URL } which is wrong for drizzle-orm 0.45.1
mysql2 drizzle() expects connection:string with mode:'default' when schema is provided
This bug exists on main branch too (same template, same { uri: ... } format)
BugJ: db package.json missing postinstall:prisma generate — bun install did not auto-generate Prisma client
Fixed in package-configs.ts: added scripts['postinstall'] = 'prisma generate' for orm===prisma
Known incompatibility (not fixed): TypeORM + better-auth — better-auth has no TypeORM adapter
Combo 5 uses --auth none to work around this; CLI does not block this combination
Batch-3 cherry-picked fixes also active: NestJS tsconfig decorators, NestJS conditionals for orpc/trpc/ai files,
NestJS _res, AdonisJS router.route, AdonisJS 2-arg authHandler, Drizzle .js schema barrels, Elysia no const app=

rows: 1 compiler warning (unused import in generated code)
